import sys

def main():
    answers = []
    for i in xrange(10001):
        n = i + 1
        a = n>>1
        ans = a*(a-1)
        if n&1: ans += a
        answers.append(ans)
    inp = [int(i.strip()) for i in sys.stdin.read().split()]
    out = ""
    t = inp[0]
    for _ in xrange(1,t+1):
        out+=str(answers[inp[_]])+"\n"
    print out[:-1]
main()
